mapper.select:
select count(m.id) from V7_UNIVERSAL_LOG m
1=1
and m.v7_u_module_name like '%${moduleName}%'
and m.v7_u_feature_name like '%${featureName}%'
and m.v7_u_request_result like '%${requestResult}%'
and v7_u_request_time >= #{startTime}
and m.v7_u_request_time <= #{endTime}
mapper.sql: id, v7_u_module_name, v7_u_feature_name, v7_u_feature_path, v7_u_request_result, v7_u_request_user, v7_u_request_time, v7_u_request_pcname, v7_u_request_ip, extends1, extends2, extends3, extends4, extends5
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from V7_UNIVERSAL_LOG
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from V7_UNIVERSAL_LOG
order by ${orderByClause}
